title: Meme Coin Mania Drives Degens to Base, the Ethereum Level-2 Chain from Coinbase - Decrypt
summary:
Title: Meme Coin Mania Drives Degens to Base, the Ethereum Level-2 Chain from Coinbase

Summary:

* Coinbase's Ethereum layer-2 network, Base, has seen a surge in activity due to meme coins, with LeetSwap recording $200 million in trading volume and 377,000 transactions.
* Tokens like BALD, BASED, and COIN have experienced dizzying gains, with BALD surging 3,100% and BASED reaching a market capitalization of $291 million.
* Decentralized exchanges like LeetSwap are a common venue for meme coin mania, but traders are warned to be vigilant against scammers and rug pulls.
* Notable crypto influencer Lady of Crypto has bridged some funds to partake in the mania but warned followers to only gamble with money they can afford to lose.

title: Alibaba, silver, gold, Bitcoin, Ethereum: Mike Novogratz's ideal portfolio - Cointelegraph
summary: Galaxy Digital founder Mike Novogratz suggests an ideal investment portfolio for young and high-risk tolerance investors, including Alibaba stock, silver, gold, Bitcoin, and Ethereum. He believes BlackRock's push into Bitcoin is a positive development and could lead to new highs in Bitcoin prices. Novogratz also comments on Ripple's case vs. the Securities and Exchange Commission, stating that the decision proves the rules surrounding cryptocurrencies are unclear. Finally, he discusses the possibility of "orange-pilling" children through Bitcoin-themed children's books.

title: Ethereum Price Prediction as Cryptos Consolidates...ETH at $2,500 in sight? - CryptoTicker.io - Bitcoin Price, Ethereum Price & Crypto News
summary: Ethereum price prediction for August: $2,150-$2,350. Sideways movement in the last few weeks, could break out to the upside and reach $2,500. External factors such as Blackrock Bitcoin ETF approval could impact price.

title: CME's latest crypto product set to go live as traders flock to Bitcoin, Ethereum derivatives - DLNews
summary: The CME Group is launching Ether/Bitcoin ratio futures, allowing traders to bet on both assets in a single trade with lower volatility. This product will be cash-settled to the value of the Ethereum futures price divided by the corresponding Bitcoin futures price at settlement. The move comes as traders increasingly turn to derivatives amid regulatory uncertainty and to limit risk exposure to unregulated counterparties. Bitcoin and Ethereum derivatives volumes and open interest have reached record highs this year, with the number of large open interest holders also increasing. The CME's second-quarter insights report noted that institutional investors have favored exposure through options and futures, which eliminates the need for custody of crypto assets.

title: OpenSea: Sales of Ethereum, Polygon NFTs plummet to new lows - AMBCrypto News
summary: OpenSea NFT sales have plummeted to new lows, with Ethereum and Polygon-minted NFTs experiencing an 82% and 98% drop in monthly sales volume, respectively, since February. The total sales volume in July stands at $120.79 million, a 43% decrease from the previous month. The count of Ethereum NFTs sold has also declined by 43%, while Polygon NFTs have seen a 29% increase in sales. Blur continues to dominate OpenSea in terms of monthly NFT trading volume, with $378.41 million in trading volume, while OpenSea trails behind with $126 million. However, OpenSea has seen a higher number of traders than Blur, with 305,295 traders completing NFT transactions on the platform in the last month.

title: Cryptocurrency Price Today: Bitcoin Remains Above 29,000 Mark As Shiba Inu Becomes Top Gainer - ABP Live
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) rose above $29,000 and $18,000 marks respectively, but BTC saw losses percentage-wise. Shiba Inu (SHIB) was the biggest gainer with a 24-hour jump of 5.38%, followed by Uniswap (UNI), Maker (MKR), Quant (QNT), and Immutable (IMX). Toncoin (TON) was the biggest loser with a 6.60% loss. Other popular altcoins like Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), and Solana (SOL) also saw gains. The global crypto market cap stood at $1.19 trillion, with a 24-hour gain of 0.09%.

title: Ethereum MEV Bots See One Of The Most Profitable Days Due To Exploit | Bitcoinist.com - Bitcoinist
summary: Ethereum MEV bots had a profitable day due to an exploit on the Curve Finance platform, with one bot earning over $1 million in ETH and other bots earning smaller amounts. The bots use a strategy called "MEV" to front-run incoming transactions and earn rewards. However, the morality of validators receiving these rewards has been called into question, with some users arguing that the money paid to validators is the proceeds of hacked funds. A poll conducted by the article's author shows that 44.9% of respondents believe that the bot deployers should keep the rewards, while 55.1% believe they should return them. One MEV bot deployer has acted in good faith and returned revenue generated from frontrunning the hacker's transaction.
